overview:
1. MS (Applied Physics) from Stanford University, USA . Several papers and patents in the field of Laser Physics and Optical Communication. Taught at Stanford and Oregon State Unversity.

  2. A technocrat by profession, wit experience of over 15 years with leading high technology companies in USA and India in the fields of Communication, Instrumentation and Fiber Optics.

  3. Worked with leadnology technology companies like Photon Kinetics, Tektronix and with innovative venture funded start up companies like Aurionics and Optivideo.

  4. Director with Hinditron Group, one of Indiaâ€™s oldest IT / Technology companies where she started and ran the Telecommunication and Broadband business.

  5. Consults with companies to develop innovative technologies.

  6. Deep connections within business community, IT induustry and academic institutions in India and US.
